xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 06 July 2014
xwikidoc.content: <phenotips_org> has joined #phenotips 12:04 <akats> has joined #phenotips 12:04 <akats> sdumitriu: Tell me if you experience trouble with Gene Matcher's self signed certificate. 12:07 <sdumitriu1> I think we might 12:08 <sdumitriu1> Do you know how to disable cert validation? I can show you the code 12:11 <akats> No idea how to disable it 12:12 <akats> What I have found on the internet were two streams of thought 12:12 <akats> There was adding the certificate authority and java not coming with the right libraries by default 12:13 <akats> These http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jce-7-download-432124.html 12:19 <akats> Maybe something like this? http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2703161/how-to-ignore-ssl-certificate-errors-in-apache-httpclient-4-0 12:19 <akats> Want me to try? 12:32 <sdumitriu1> akats: Yes, I think that's the one 12:32 <sdumitriu1> I have some code on a local branch 12:32 <sdumitriu1> I'll push it when I have a free minute 12:33 <akats> Ok. 19:52 <jim_> has quit 20:20 <akats> has quit
